dialogue.sjis: にも召喚獣か よかったな！
dialogue.ascii: Good for you to have a Summon Beast, δ!

dialogue.sjis: 魚釣りなんて、何がおもしろいのかしら おまけに偏屈なおじさんに まともな道具も用意できないヤツは
dialogue.ascii: What's so fun about fishing? You have to deal with some eccentric old man!

dialogue.sjis: 釣りをする資格がないって 仕切られちゃうし ホント、何がおもしろいのかしら
dialogue.ascii: He said that I don't have the qualifications to fish... Really, what's so fun about that?
